Entry-Level Cybersecurity Engineer

I'm Shaun, a dedicated entry-level cybersecurity engineer with a strong foundation in problem-solving and data analysis. I'm eager to apply my skills to a challenging role in cybersecurity. With a passion for technology and a commitment to staying updated with the latest industry trends, I'm ready to contribute to a team focused on safeguarding digital assets.
